1.title: Start the Year Off Right

episode of.title: Drop 5 lbs with Good Housekeeping (TV Series 2012– )

1.plot: Chicken breasts with apple-curry sauce and tips from fitness expert Ashley Borden are featured in the premiere of this series about weight-loss. Topics: slimming recipes; fat-burning exercises; and shopping and dining advice.

episode of.title: Drop 5 lbs with Good Housekeeping (TV Series 2012– )

2.plot: Circuit-training secrets. Also: salmon cakes are prepared; a chocolate-chip-cookie recipe is featured.

episode of.title: Drop 5 lbs with Good Housekeeping (TV Series 2012– )

episode of.title: Drop 5 lbs with Good Housekeeping (TV Series 2012– )
